parameters.text: Welcome to a new world of useless knowledge

RandomMTAFacts is built to be your go-to place for information about the MTA you will likely never use! This app uses cookies to save data on which random facts you have seen and allows you to play in quiz mode.
Click Accept below to allow for cookie usage.

dynamicports.name: inputMappingScript
inputMappingScript

parameters.functionScript:
localStorage.removeItem('userData');
Outputs.Done();
Outputs.Date = new Date();

Outputs.Settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('settings'));
Outputs.Done();
Outputs.Exists = Inputs.Settings != null;

parameters.text:
This site uses cookies to store quiz scores, keep track of which facts you have seen, and save your settings across sessions. 
We do not store other personal data or provide any data to third parties.
